Package org.drip.analytics.definition

Class MarketSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.definition.MarketSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve, LatentState
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasisSplineMarketSurface
    public abstract class MarketSurface
extends java.lang.Object
implements Curve
    MarketSurface exposes the stub that implements the market surface that holds the latent state's Evolution parameters.
    • Module = Analytics
    • Package = Definition
    • Specification = Fixed Income
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
